thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Matt K

author: Matt K
title: Matt K
text:
I'd just like to say thank you very much Sam and the team from Motorama Kia Moorooka for making the whole process of buying a new car very easy and enjoyable.
He made my wife feel at ease, right from the moment he approached us at the Kia dealers a few weeks ago. We started out with a very confusing selection of about 50 car/model combinations to look at across all car brands. Not only did he talk mainly to my wife about the Kia models available but he listened to her needs. When we left she had the Kia Cerato at the top of our list, not only because she liked the car but the high level of service and information was given to us. What ever your doing keep it up.
We looked at 8 different Dealers in Moorooka that day and not one of them have even bothered to call us back or follow up.
